General.Name: O-TA Precision Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: O-TA Precision Industry Co., Ltd. engages in manufacturing, subcontract processing, assembling, and selling golf heads and semi-finished products primarily in Taiwan. The company offers metal woods, iron heads, CNC putters, shafts, and assemblies. It also develops bicycles under the VOLANDO brand; and provides ALLTAS stainless steel faucets. In addition, the company exports its products to Japan and the United States. O-TA Precision Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Pingtung, Taiwan.
